If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer In 1999, designer Nancy Yoo created Fleur't lingerie based on a simple need: flirty, feminine lingerie that fits and feels good. Fleur't camisoles and lace-trimmed panties are comfortable enough for everyday yet beautiful enough for special occasions. Rendered in materials that stretch gently and softly, they conform to a variety of body types and are accented with delicate embroidery, whimsical appliqués, and rich colors, offering women a much-needed alternative to mainstream lingerie. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
